properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 2 at 2:30AM PST until January 3 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south wind increasing to 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 40 kt early Thursday evening and continuing
through early Friday afternoon. Seas 13 to 16 feet at 15 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south wind increasing to
15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt by this afternoon with seas
14 to 16 feet at 17 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM and Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade
Head OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 1 PM
PST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM PST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY
